it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class SpawnCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.Cell
      • it.polimi.ingsw.model.SpawnCell

  • public class SpawnCell
extends Cell
    The class represents a spawning cell

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Color spawn
      spawn represents the color of the cell (needed in spawning phase to identify the correct spawning point)
      private Weapon[] weapons
      Weapons in cell that can be collected from the players

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpawnCell(Side[] sides, int roomNumber, Color spawn)
      instantiates the spawning cell with the superclass constructor, adding the cell color

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Color getSpawn()
      Returns the spawning color of the cell
      java.util.List<Weapon> getWeapons()
      returns a list with the weapons inside the cell, without modifying the list itself
      Weapon pickWeapon(Weapon chosen)
      Removes the given weapon from the array and returns it (if exists)
      void refillWeapon(Weapon refillWeapon)
      add the given weapon to the cell weapon array (if the array length is lower than 3)

      • Methods inherited from class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Cell

        addPawn, getPawns, getRoomNumber, getSides, removePawn

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • spawn

        private Color spawn
        spawn represents the color of the cell (needed in spawning phase to identify the correct spawning point)

      • weapons

        private Weapon[] weapons
        Weapons in cell that can be collected from the players

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpawnCell

        SpawnCell(Side[] sides,
          int roomNumber,
          Color spawn)
        instantiates the spawning cell with the superclass constructor, adding the cell color
        Parameters:
        sides - sides of the cell
        roomNumber - room identification number
        spawn - cell color

    • Method Detail

      • getWeapons

        public java.util.List<Weapon> getWeapons()
        returns a list with the weapons inside the cell, without modifying the list itself
        Returns:
        list of weapons inside the cell

      • pickWeapon

        public Weapon pickWeapon(Weapon chosen)
        Removes the given weapon from the array and returns it (if exists)
        Parameters:
        chosen - chosen weapon to pick
        Returns:
        picked weapon (null in case of insuccess)

      • refillWeapon

        public void refillWeapon(Weapon refillWeapon)
        add the given weapon to the cell weapon array (if the array length is lower than 3)
        Parameters:
        refillWeapon - Weapon to be placed in the cell

      • getSpawn

        public Color getSpawn()
        Returns the spawning color of the cell
        Returns:
        spawn Color
